==============================================

### Expected Contract End Date
* EN 2023-07-01

### Description
---------------------------------------

The Farm Debt Mediation Service (FDMS) is administered by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) to provide a streamlined process for mediation and settlement planning for insolvent farmers. This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) invites suppliers to submit an offer for the provision of services to support the FDMS in British Columbia.

## Statement of Work
------------------------

The services required are for a period of four years, starting August 1, 2023. The total budget for the standing offers will be approximately $480,000. The services will include:

* Facilitating mediation between farmers and creditors
* Providing unbiased mediation services
* Creating and implementing recovery plans for insolvent farmers
* Liaising with farmers, creditors, and AAFC representatives

## Evaluation Criteria
-----------------------

Offers will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The evaluation will consider the following factors:

* 70% technical merit, including:
	+ Ability to provide unbiased mediation services
	+ Quality of recovery plans and implementation
	+ Ability to liase with farmers, creditors, and AAFC representatives
* 30% price

## Notice of Amendment to Original RFSO
---------------------------------------------

The original RFSO was amended on July 17, 2023. The Amendment clarifies the evaluation criteria and the scope of work.
